{{Description|This pot used to carry concentrated and extremely potent concoctions. It is now empty, but still gives off a strong smell of medicine.}}
'''Traveling Doctor's Medicine Pot''' is an [[Artifact]] in the set [[Traveling Doctor]].

==Description==
The medicine has long dried up, but its bitter smell still lingers in this pot.<br />With that bitter medicine, the traveling doctor saved countless lives.<br />And when she fell seriously ill, no one was there for her except for the medicine pot on the furnace.
